name: flummoxed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
so confused that you do not know what to do: He looked completely flummoxed. Doctors were flummoxed by the boy's symptoms. See
flummox
More examplesFewer examplesHe studied the document for several long, flummoxed minutes.She was flummoxed by the rejection.Economists are flummoxed about the nation's economic health.
